text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to assert that the compilation is \u201cexempt from copyright\u201d or that no permission is needed to reuse newspaper articles. The candidate answer does not make this assertion. Instead, in Section 5, it explicitly warns the author that they must secure permissions for the newspaper extracts, stating: \"The publisher will not take on the risk of copyright infringement for the newspaper extracts.
